about_the_game:
"Criminal Attraction" is an Adult Visual Novel based on multiple-choice decisions. The player will assume the role of the protagonist and encounter various female characters with whom they can interact and potentially develop a relationship. Player decisions will impact the evolution of the story, leading to different scenes based on their behavior.

The story begins as you exit the FBI training course, having proven yourself as the best in your class. However, you face disdain from colleagues due to being the son of a convicted thief. One day, Emily Anderson, a colleague you barely know, offers you a collaboration. You find yourself working undercover in an alleged criminal gang called "cosplayers", who are actually bank robbers. According to Emily, the cosplayers are masquerading as masseuses.

In this narrative, you must gather evidence incriminating them for the crimes committed. It won't be easy, as the charm of the four girls may bewitch you. You'll have to contend with yourself and challenge your principles of justice and legality. Desire, sex, love... battling these emotions won't be easy. Will you fall in love with them? Deceive them? Be with or against them? The choice is yours!

Features:

3500 Full HD Images
100 Full HD Animations
98,000 Words
Multiple Choices
Music & Sound Effects
Sex SFX
4 different endings based on player choices
You Can Decide the Name Of the Character
Ren'py Engine



Main Characters:

Emily Anderson - MC's Colleague
Very serious and professional. Determined. Lacks a social life. Knowledgeable, talkative, controversial. She has made her work her life. Colleagues view her unfavorably, mocking her. Emily has no intention of having a relationship with anyone, especially not with MC. Can you change her mind?

Imelda Thorne - Gang Leader
Elder sister of Monique. Imelda is the widow of a wealthy and unscrupulous businessman. Strong and determined, with great wisdom and foresight. Cautious, making the best decisions for everyone. Patient and tolerant. She exudes self-assurance and remains composed even in the most dangerous situations. An expert at analyzing everything—situations, people, and decisions. She is the confidante of all the girls in the gang. Imelda seeks a man different from her late husband—one who allows her to be herself, shares her life, appreciates her for who she is, flaws and all. Someone present in her life who won't neglect her.

Cordelia Ashford - Gang Hacker and Technology Expert
Due to a severe emotional trauma, Cordelia struggles to speak, has communication and socialization issues, and fears everyone. She expresses herself only when immersed in her world of computers and technology. Cordelia is not just a computer expert but also a skilled martial arts instructor. Preferring the katana, she is adept at hand-to-hand combat as well. Cordelia is deeply connected to Imelda, owing her life to her. Her closed-off nature makes her enigmatic, especially regarding her romantic life. No one knows anything, and everyone is afraid to ask. Can you get her to open up to you?



Monique Thorne - Actress and Camouflage Expert
Younger sister of Imelda. Studied theater and acting, with minor roles in various TV series. Monique is the intellectual of the group, well-read with extensive travel experience. She doesn't trust people much, fearing they might deceive or betray her, much like she has done to others. Monique tends to be invasive in the lives of the other girls, protecting them. Winning Monique over will be very challenging, but if you succeed, you won't be disappointed!

Amina Murati - Weapons, Explosives, and Warfare Tactics Expert
The youngest in the group, Amina is skilled in both armed and unarmed combat. Daggers are her favorite weapons, but she is also an explosives expert. Amina worked as a mercenary in war zones, where she met Imelda. Despite her sweet and gentle nature, Amina is carefree and talkative, enjoying sharing anecdotes. Her strong personality and military background compel her to seek a strong and authoritative man—someone worthy of her respect and esteem, someone who knows how to command and dominate her.
